author: Valley City Times-Record
title: A Seamless Visa Experience for Citizens of Austria, Argentina, Belgium, and the Czech Republic | User | times-online.com
text: In a bid to strengthen cultural ties and foster international tourism, the Government of India proudly extends a warm invitation to citizens of Austria, Argentina, Belgium, and the Czech Republic through its user-friendly online visa application process. This initiative aims to provide a streamlined and efficient avenue for individuals from these countries to explore the rich tapestry of India's diverse landscapes, historical wonders, and vibrant traditions. Since 2014, Austrian citizens have been granted the exclusive privilege of applying for an Indian e-Visa online, marking a significant advancement in travel facilitation. This electronic travel authorization streamlines the entry process for a multitude of purposes, providing Austrian nationals with unparalleled convenience and flexibility. Whether embarking on a leisurely exploration of India's diverse cultural heritage, engaging in business activities, or seeking medical assistance, the e-Visa offers Austrian travelers a seamless and time-efficient means to obtain authorization. This initiative reflects the commitment of the Indian government to enhance the overall travel experience for Austrian citizens, encouraging a broader spectrum of engagements, from tourist adventures and commercial endeavors to accessing quality medical services in the vibrant and diverse landscapes of India. The Indian government extends a warm welcome to the citizens of Argentina, providing them with an efficient online application process for the e-visa. This initiative allows Argentinians to embark on a journey to explore India's rich cultural heritage, dynamic cities, and breathtaking natural landscapes. With the e-Visa, citizens of Argentina gain simplified access to the diverse tapestry of experiences that India has to offer, whether immersing themselves in historical wonders, navigating vibrant urban centers, or indulging in the serenity of natural beauty. This streamlined approach reflects India's commitment to fostering international connections, inviting Argentinians to partake in the cultural exchange that lies at the heart of this initiative, making their travel aspirations to India more accessible and enjoyable. Indian Visa for Belgian Citizens Belgian citizens can now easily secure an Indian e-Visa through a user-friendly online platform. This streamlined process eliminates unnecessary complexities, offering a hassle-free application experience for various purposes, including tourism, business, and medical visits to India. The convenience of the e-Visa system enhances accessibility, allowing citizens of Belgium to explore the diverse offerings of India, from its historical landmarks and cultural treasures to vibrant urban landscapes and natural wonders. The Indian government's commitment to providing a straightforward and efficient visa application process reflects its dedication to fostering international connections and encouraging Belgians to partake in the enriching experiences that India has to offer. This initiative enhances the overall travel experience, making it more convenient and enjoyable for citizens of Belgium to discover the beauty and diversity of India. Indian Visa for Czech Citizens Czech Republic citizens are warmly encouraged to apply for an Indian e-Visa, providing them with enhanced accessibility to explore India for tourism, business engagements, or medical purposes. The digital application process has been designed to streamline the overall experience, ensuring a straightforward and efficient visa application for Czech nationals. This initiative reflects the Indian government's commitment to facilitating international travel and fostering stronger ties between the two nations. The e-Visa option offers Czech citizens the opportunity to discover India's rich cultural heritage, vibrant landscapes, and bustling cities with greater convenience. By embracing the digital era, India aims to make the visa application process more accessible and user-friendly, inviting citizens of the Czech Republic to embark on fulfilling journeys and create lasting memories in the diverse tapestry of India. A transit visa is a document that indicates that a traveler has been granted permission by the government to transit through but not remain in a country. A transit visa permits the visa holder to travel to their final destination through India. Foreign nationals who want to visit India are normally allowed to travel in transit. If the applicant is a permanent resident, a transit visa is all that is required. Even if they are passing through on their way to another country, most travelers visiting India require a visa. Citizens are not permitted to change their minds. If the applicant is not a permanent resident, a non-immigrant (a foreign citizen) can apply for an immigrant or transit visa. Some nationalities are required to apply for a transit visa for India at an embassy or consulate in advance. However, most foreign passport holders can now obtain an electronic transit visa for India via a simple online application. If they already have a valid India e-Visa For example, if they have an approved business visa or medical visa, they do not need to apply for a transit visa if they are transiting through India for more than 24 hours. This is because these types of visas are multiple entry visas for India which allow the holder to enter India multiple times during their validity. Eligible applicants for a Transit Visa to India can complete the online e-Visa Application Form which includes minutes to enter basic passport, passport, and travel information. Media Contact Company Name: INDIAN EVISA Official Government Immigration Visa Application Online Contact Person: Mary Windham Caitlin Email: Send Email Country: India Website: indian-visa-online.com/bn/visa/

author: @insideedition
title: House Where Four Idaho Students Were Murdered is Demolished | Inside Edition
text: The six-bedroom house was demolished early Thursday morning. The house where four [University of Idaho students were murdered](https://www.insideedition.com/tag/university-of-idaho-murders) has been torn down. Demolition of the six-bedroom house began as dawn broke over the college campus, which had emptied out due to the winter holiday break. Cable news channels captured the destruction live. NewsNation’s Nancy Loo was at the scene. “Sanitation crews are being followed by law enforcement. Law enforcement will actually guard the debris. They didn’t say for how long, but, yes, they are concerned about morbid souvenir hunters,” Loo says. Students Madison Mogen, Kaylee Goncalves, Xana Kernodle, and Ethan Chapin were stabbed to death in November 2022 in a case that shocked the country. Twenty-eight-year-old defendant criminology PhD student [Bryan Kohberger](https://www.insideedition.com/tag/bryan-kohberger) has pleaded not guilty and is awaiting trial. The house cost the university $700 a day for round-the-clock security guards. The university says demolishing the house is the first step in the community’s healing from the trauma. However, the demolition has divided the victims’ families. Ethan Chapin’s family supports it, but Kaylee Goncalves and Xana Kernodle’s loved ones expressed strong opposition. “They’re pretty upset. I mean, it's one of those things when you don’t really think it's gonna happen until it happens. And so watching the demo on the television was pretty hard for the victims’ families,” Shannon Gray, the Goncalves family attorney, says. After 90 minutes, the house was gone, but the horror of what happened there remains. The University says they plan on building what they call a healing garden where the house once stood.

author: @TUDNUSA
title: José Mourinho convierte al Manchester United en el rey del empate en Europa League
text:
[Manchester United](/futbol/premier-league/manchester-united)
José Mourinho convierte al Manchester United en el rey del empate en Europa League
Un gol de Youssef En-Nesyri evitó que los Red Devils consiguieran su primera victoria del torneo europeo tras el gol de Christian Eriksen.
Manchester United y José Mourinho se reencontraron en la UEFA Europa League en el Fenerbahçe Şükrü Saracoğlu Spor Kompleks de Estambúl, Turquía, casa del Fenerbahçe dentro de la tercera jornada de la competición.
Incluso, previo al [encuentro tanto Mourinho como Casemiro se fundieron en un abrazo](https://www.tudn.com/futbol/uefa-europa-league/nostalgia-mil-el-reencuentro-de-mourinho-con-casemiro-video) luego de que coincidieran en el Real Madrid, ahora con destinos separados.
Christan Eriksen abrió el marcador con un tremendo cañonazo a los 15 minutos de juego para que los Red Devils mantuvieran el dominio del partido, al menos hasta el descanso.
Sin embargo, el empate llegó en el segundo tiempo por medio de la figura del Fenerbahçe, Youssef En-Nesyri, con un remate de cabeza al 49’ y que a la postre fue para sentenciar el empate.
El portero camerunés Onana incluso tuvo un par de intervenciones prácticamente sobre línea de gol que evitaron en un par de ocasiones un gol de Youssef En-Nesyri que pudo significar en ese momento el empate.
Marcus Rashford, por su parte, cerró de mala forma una jugada individual que no pudo acabar en gol; debió dejar su lugar a [Antony, quien sólo duró 16 minutos en la cancha antes de salir por lesión](https://www.tudn.com/futbol/uefa-europa-league/terrible-baja-antony-sale-con-apenas-16-minutos-en-cancha-video) y ceder su lugar a Amad Diallo.
[Con este resultado, Fenerbahçe llegó a cinco puntos](https://www.tudn.com/futbol/uefa-europa-league/fenerbahce-vs-manchester-united-uefa-europa-league-2024-10-24) en la Fase de Liga de la UEFA Europa League tras tres jornadas, obra de un triunfo y dos empates. Manchester United, en tanto, suma tres unidades luego de mismo número de empates.
El próximo encuentro de Fenerbahçe en la UEFA Europa League es el 7 de noviembre próximo en visita al AZ Alkmaar de la Eredivise. Manchester United, por su parte, jugará un día después ante Bodø/Glimt.
¡Goool de la Lazio! Pedro le da la victoria a la escuadra italiana
¡Gol del Porto! El canadiense Eustáquio le da el empate a Porto

author: Newsweek
title: F1 News: Lando Norris Regrets ‘Clouding Over’ Oscar Piastri’s Maiden Formula One Victory
text:
Lando Norris, who found himself inadvertently overshadowing team-mate Oscar Piastri’s first Formula 1 win in Hungary, expressed deep regret over the circumstances.
Norris, who had leapfrogged ahead of Piastri due to a strategic pit stop decision by McLaren, held onto the lead for 20 tension-filled laps. This delay in swapping positions, according to Norris, marred what should have been a jubilant celebration for Piastri. He explained to Sky Sports F1 :
“Could it have been handled slightly differently from both the team side and a personal side? Yes, absolutely, and I think we wouldn’t have been having this conversation now in some ways.
“Whether people on the outside think and [are] going to come up with their own stories of what happened and what I would and wouldn’t have done, I don’t mind about that.
“The things that I could have done, the fact that I kind of clouded over Oscar’s first race win in Formula 1 is something I’ve not felt too proud about.
“The fact we had a one-two and that was barely a headline after the race. The fact we had a one-two and nothing was really spoken about it from that side, that’s the bits I felt worse about.
“Apart from that we discussed it, we have spoken abut it. Both sides could have done things a little bit better, a little bit differently. It’s almost not good that we had it, but a good moment we’ve had it [at the same time], we’ve learned from it and hopefully it’s done better next time.”
Norris felt that the overshadowing of the team’s one-two finish, a significant achievement, was the most regrettable aspect. He expressed disappointment that “the fact we had a one-two and that was barely a headline after the race” left the whole team underappreciated.
The championship standings added another layer of complexity to Norris’s decision at the Hungarian GP. Despite being closer to the championship leader in points, Norris dismissed any bias within team decisions, vehemently stating:
“That had nothing to do with last week. I shouldn’t have led the race, that’s the end of it.
“Oscar got me off the line, he controlled it well, that was it. I shouldn’t have led the race and so people should then never have had the perception of ‘ah, the team are not biasing towards Lando’. If Oscar was leading the whole race there is absolutely zero reason why they should ask him to let me past.
“If you are thinking of it from a championship point of view, I don’t know when the point is of like if I’m 10 points behind, 15 points behind, whatever, at what point then do you go ‘can you help out a bit more’ or can you do this or do that?
“I don’t know when that point is and that’s not my decision. But when Oscar has led the whole race, controlled it well, and just from a strategy side they have boxed me first just to be safe, that’s just given the perception of something completely different.
“It shouldn’t do, internally we know it doesn’t. Oscar deserved to win and he did, as simple as that.”
Uncommon Knowledge Newsweek is committed to challenging conventional wisdom and finding connections in the search for common ground.
Newsweek is committed to challenging conventional wisdom and finding connections in the search for common ground.
The post F1 News: Lando Norris Regrets ‘Clouding Over’ Oscar Piastri’s Maiden Formula One Victory appeared first on Newsweek .

author: AFP
title: Guinea's economy struggles after fuel depot fire - Digital Journal
text:
It took nine days for the blaze in Conakry to be fully extinguished after a blast rocked the state oil company's main depot - Copyright GETTY IMAGES NORTH AMERICA/AFP/File SPENCER PLATT Mouctar BAH Almost two weeks after a huge fire in Guinea’s main fuel depot brought death and destruction, anger is growing as the economy is reeling, with inflation rising, petrol rationed and no trucks moving merchandise.
It took nine days for the blaze to be fully extinguished after a blast rocked the state oil company’s main depot on December 18 in the capital Conakry, where 24 people died and another 454 were injured.
But Guinea will likely feel the aftereffects for the foreseeable future.
The west African nation remains one of the least developed countries in the world despite being rich in minerals, including gold and bauxite.
At Conakry’s main market, Madina, most stores are closed. Merchandise trucks sit idled at the foot of buildings.
Traffic has also come to a standstill at the port of Conakry, near the epicentre of the fire.
The streets of the capital have fewer vehicles than usual — except for the massive lines at petrol stations.
With little fuel available, fishermen stay close to the coast where there are fewer fish to catch.
The government — led since September 2021 by a military junta that deposed the country’s first democratically-elected president — announced on Saturday that petrol distribution would resume.
But fuel is rationed, limited to 25 litres per vehicle, and five litres per motorcycle and three-wheeled tuk-tuk. The use of jerrycans was banned to prevent a black market from emerging.
“There is suffering,” said Mamadou Yaya Bah, a tuk-tuk taxi driver who sat for hours waiting for his turn at a service station in Conakry.
He said his fares have tripled or quadrupled due to the rationing.
Taxi drivers are not venturing out of the capital.
“We are never sure to find fuel in the interior of the country,” said taxi driver Mamadou Saliou Balde.
– ‘Too much hassle’ –
Goods are not reaching areas outside of the capital, either, where roads are constantly in bad shape.
Alpha Kabine Doumbouya, a trader who has three delivery trucks and five taxis in Kankan, 600 kilometres east of Conakry, said all of the vehicles have stopped service.
“If Conakry coughs, the rest of the country catches a cold,” he said.
“The drivers are out of work. We are getting by here at my wife’s restaurant while waiting for better days,” he said.
A customs officer at Guinea’s border with Sierra Leone told AFP that the vehicles that used to go and get goods in Conakry are no longer coming.
“No fuel, no security, too much hassle,” he said on condition of anonymity.
Neighbouring countries are helping out.
Sierra Leone has given Guinea permission to use its depots to store its petroleum products. On Wednesday, Ivory Coast said it would deliver 50 million litres of petrol a month to Guinea.
– ‘Tipping point’ –
The crisis is expected to cut economic growth by 0.7 percentage points this year, according to the National Statistics Institute.
Transport costs have jumped by 60 percent nationally, said Guinean economist Tidiane Barry.
Public finances will also take a hit as revenue from the energy and transport sectors fall, Barry said.
Inflation is expected to top 10 percent in December, and more than 15 percent in Conakry alone, the economist added.
At the Taouyah market, Hawa Toure’s grocery bag was empty.
“I have nothing to put in my bag because prices at the market have suddenly become so high,” she said.
Vegetable seller Aminata Camara was falling asleep in his stall.
“I’m still waiting for the first customer,” he said. “I don’t know what Guinea did to god to deserve this punishment.”
Barry said the disaster is a “tipping point” for Guinea as it has exposed the vulnerabilities of its economy, including its reliance on oil.
But it is also a chance to rethink Guinea’s economic strategy.
“Investing in safe infrastructure, diversifying the economy and strengthening regional cooperation are key steps towards sustainable and resilient economic development,” Barry said.

author: Bruno Silvano
title: Paraíso Tropical: 1ª cena de Bebel e Olavo é comemorada nas redes
text: No capítulo de quinta (28) de "Paraíso Tropical" (Globo), Bebel (Camila Pitanga) e Olavo (Wagner Moura) tiveram o tão aguardado primeiro encontro. - Quer ficar por dentro de tudo o que rola no mundo das novelas? [Clique aqui e faça parte do nosso canal no WhatsApp.](http://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029VaBGBRH9Bb64Mrxbgz1K) Para conhecer o empresário, [a prostituta deu um golpe em seu cafetão.](https://www.uol.com.br/splash/noticias/2023/12/27/como-sera-1-encontro-de-bebel-e-olavo-em-paraiso-tropical.htm) Ao ouvir Jader (Chico Diaz) combinando de mandar uma garota de luxo para o sobrinho de Antenor (Tony Ramo), Bebel sai escondida e vai até o local atender Olavo em segredo. De cara, os dois já ficam encantados um pelo outro. "Nossa, você é ainda melhor do que eu imaginava", diz a moça ao ver o filho de Marion (Vera Holtz). Nas redes sociais, os telespectadoras comemoram a cena. "Agora começa o melhor casal de todos os tempos", escreveu um usuário do X (antigo Twitter). "O encontro icônico de Bebel e Olavo finalmente veio aí", disse outro. "Eles vão começar a barbarizar agora", afirmou um terceiro. "Dr. Olavo Morais."-- Sérgio Santos (@ZAMENZA) "Novaes." "Melhor do que eu imaginava. Sorte a minha." (Bebel) Agora começa o melhor casal de todos os tempos. (@leocastromj1) [#ParaísoTropical] [pic.twitter.com/7tSWJZyrfB] [December 28, 2023] eles vao começar a barbarizar AGORA-- paraisotropicando (@celebridando) [#paraisotropical] [pic.twitter.com/OFhdwEELQ0] [December 28, 2023] Esse primeiro encontro de Olavo e Bebel... ???-- Duh Secco (@DuhSecco) [#ParaísoTropical] [December 28, 2023] a Bebel anotando o endereço do Olavo na mão dela -- nave X (@_nave_x) [#ParaisoTropical] [pic.twitter.com/x8PjFkMbjP] [December 28, 2023] "Doutor Olavo Moraes" (Bebel)-- Tiago Dias Brandwain de Vielmond (@dia_tiago) "Novaes" (Olavo) "Novaes... Oi! Melhor que eu imaginava, hein?! Sorte a minha!" (Bebel) Primeiro encontro do maior casal da novela e química mais arrebatadora da teledramaturgia. author: Emanuel Zapata
title: Alianza Lima: Mr. Peet lapidó a Ángel De la Cruz y reveló que 3 jugadores del club íntimo y Alejandro Restrepo le llamaron la atención: "¿Qué pasa?" | Deportes | La República
text: Mr. Peet lapidó a De la Cruz y reveló que 3 jugadores de Alianza Lima y Restrepo le llamaron la atención: "¿Qué pasa?" Mr. Peet contó lo que ocurrió en el campo entre el portero de Alianza Lima Ángel de la Cruz con algunos jugadores del club y el DT Alejandro Restrepo tras la derrota ante Bolívar por la Copa Ciudad de los Reyes. El último miércoles 26 de junio, [Alianza Lima perdió 3-2 ante Bolívar en un partido amistoso](https://larepublica.pe/deportes/2024/06/25/ver-alianza-lima-vs-bolivar-en-vivo-copa-ciudad-de-los-reyes-via-zapping-tv-amistoso-2024-1263325) por la Copa Ciudad de los Reyes 2024. En un partido lleno de expulsiones (Aldair Fuentes, Catriel Cabellos y Rubén Cordano), los íntimos no pudieron imponerse en el estadio Alejandro Villanueva y ahora jugarán por el tercer lugar del torneo contra el ganador del duelo entre [Sporting Cristal y Atlético Nacional](https://larepublica.pe/deportes/2024/06/26/ver-sporting-cristal-vs-atletico-nacional-en-vivo-via-zapping-tv-copa-ciudad-de-reyes-1593046). El cuadro victoriano empezó ganando con tantos de Ricardo Lagos y Jeriel De Santi, pero después el conjunto visitante lo dio vuelta con goles de Henry Vaca y Bruno Sávio (doblete). Uno de los protagonistas de este cotejo fue el portero de Alianza Lima Ángel de la Cruz, quien fue cómplice de dos de los tres goles del equipo boliviano. El comentarista deportivo Mr. Peet criticó el bajo nivel mostrado por el guardameta juvenil no solo en este encuentro, sino a lo largo de la temporada cuando le ha tocado ingresar al campo, y contó algunos impases que vivió en el último duelo ante Bolívar. PUEDES VER: [Revelan la charla que tuvo Fossati con sus jugadores luego de la dura derrota ante Canadá por la Copa América] ¿Qué pasó con Ángel de la Cruz durante el Alianza Lima vs. Bolívar? En la última edición del programa 'Madrugol', el narrador de fútbol contó que Alejandro Restrepo, Juan Pablo Freytes y Adrián Arregui le llamaron la atención a Ángel de la Cruz porque no entraba del todo en el juego con el equipo. "Hay un momento en el que el chico entró en trompo. Que 3 jugadores y el técnico (Alejandro Restrepo) te llamen la atención es porque algo pasó. No sé si se aturdió, no lo sé, pero hay una que Arregui le dice: 'Oye, juega que acá estoy'. Freytes también lo miraba, la gente gritaba y todo, pero él seguía como si nada", narró. Luego, precisó que el estratega colombiano fue el que más veces habló con él durante el partido para preguntarle qué pasaba, pues no seguía el mismo ritmo de sus compañeros. "Restrepo le decía: 'Oye, ¿qué pasa?, juega, ¿qué pasa?'. Hay otra que agarra la pelota, Sabbag le marca el pase para que se la tire y Restrepo le vuelve a decir: '¿Qué pasa?, juega', pero no reaccionaba", detalló. PUEDES VER: [¿Qué pasa si Perú y Chile igualan en puntos en la última fecha de la fase de grupos de la Copa América?] Mr. Peet criticó las actuaciones de los arqueros de Alianza Lima esta temporada 2024 El comentarista aseguró que Ángelo Campos, Franco Saravia y Ángel de la Cruz no han estado a la altura del equipo en la presente campaña, por lo que pidió a Bruno Marioni, gerente deportivo del club victoriano, que Alianza Lima se refuerce en ese sector para el Torneo Clausura. "Yo no digo que sea un arquero de proyección, pero lamentablemente la temporada de los arqueros de Alianza Lima ha sido mala, ha sido mala. ¿Alguien va a decir lo contrario? Este 2024 no ha sido buena para ninguno de los 3 (porteros)", acotó.

author: NBC Sports
title: Postecoglou: Tottenham 'lacked energy' v. Brighton
text: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou recaps his side's 4-2 loss to Brighton at the Amex in Matchweek 19. Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou recaps his side's 4-2 loss to Brighton at the Amex in Matchweek 19. Milroe's two wins away from a national championship and letting his past doubters know it. The Chiefs haven't been the most trust-worthy team for fantasy managers this season, but our analysts believe that will change in Week 17. Tampa Bay is a practical lock to win the NFC South. From scandal and scorn to Big Ten triumph, Jim Harbaugh's Michigan tenure has been anything but boring. There's an expanded 12-team field to look forward to next season, but we're first looking back at the best games of the four-team playoff era.
